A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Character development is the driving force of this film (forgive the pun) - there's a lot to love about this movie\, but die-hards married to the originals will be less likely to accept some of the changes Rian has made. This film - oof. I cried more during The Last Jedi than I have at most funerals. Be warned that this one will find whatever heartstrings you have.... whatever nostalgia you hold dear - and will tug mercilessly until the end credits.
